TopicTitle: The Saga of Emiko Station - Complete

Articles.Content:
2 minutes ago, GDJ said:

Play Gran Turismo 6. That'll whip you into shape.

In that game, you go too fast, you're in the guardrails. 
You go too slow, other cars bump you out of the way....usually into grass and guardrails.
Drive perfect....you win.

But I like blowing up swats by crashing them into oil tankers! It's fun! And we should probably get back on topic actually.
I , for some reasson think that the scientist is Omega 77, but that makes NO SENSE

Hmmm..., I think I know who's going to Eve, and I think I just figured out how the manned Eve mission is going to turn out, and you guys are really going to like it! lol Just Jim has kept it pretty hard to guess though. But in case I'm actually right I'm not going to spoil it for you.

Edited April 4, 2016 by Jeb!

6 minutes ago, Jeb! said:

Hmmm..., I think I know who's going to Eve, and I think I just figured out how the manned Eve mission is going to turn out, and you guys are really going to like it! lol Just Jim has kept it pretty hard to guess though. But in case I'm actually right I'm not going to spoil it for you.

Kerbal stories, and the ravings of insane canned brains, let alone real life, are never amenable to figuring out in advance 

Edited April 4, 2016 by Geschosskopf

28 minutes ago, Jeb! said:

Hmmm..., I think I know who's going to Eve, and I think I just figured out how the manned Eve mission is going to turn out, and you guys are really going to like it! lol Just Jim has kept it pretty hard to guess though. But in case I'm actually right I'm not going to spoil it for you.

Is it going to end with 7 mammoth LF engines, the dipperkrash, an ore hauler, Bob scienceing the excretments out of eve, and a big court case? If so, @Kuzzter's already done that. Although a reference saying "this is going to turn out like Venus, order zero" would be kinda fun.

I know how to eliminate our "thompberry" problem:


Determination.
A maniacal flowey laugh.
And moar boosters.

Stay Determined.  .  .

Edited April 4, 2016 by SpaceplaneAddict

8 minutes ago, SpaceplaneAddict said:

I know how to eliminate our "thompberry" problem:

Determination.
A maniacal flowey laugh.
And moar boosters.

Stay Determined.  .  .

In response to this idea....

Solution to the Thompberry problem: he's connected to the ksc computer network right? So everyone plug in devices to the computers, put in ear plugs, and blast nyan cat 24 hours. 

 

Edited April 4, 2016 by max_creative

19 minutes ago, SpaceplaneAddict said:

I know how to eliminate our "thompberry" problem:


Determination.
A maniacal flowey laugh.

Stay Determined.  .  .

16 hours ago, Geschosskopf said:

Kerbal stories, and the ravings of insane canned brains, let alone real life, are never amenable to figuring out in advance 

Well, true, but I was thinking more about how I think ________ is going to get off Eve once Thompberry sends him there. And it makes sense too. (in a Kerbal world) Just start thinking too hard and you might figure it out too.

ok I better start my school work now lol

48 minutes ago, Jeb! said:

ok I better start my school work now lol

Your doing school work? I'm in science right now. And I don't care I'm going to get my school iPad taken away for today.

I ran ut of likes.....and I haven't even read the latest chapter yet......

Real Life grabbed me by the scruff of the neck and shook me like a kitten until I was finally able to get back here!   I've read  38 and 39 so far and a lot of the comments, and ran out of likes before I could finish it all.....

Does anybody but me get all melancholy watching Gene pining on the roof as the sun goes down?  He and Karenna simply have to be reunited somehow....somewhere....

Thompberry's  arrival blew up the Doodlebug??  That unspeakable fiend!

With Gem and Theo on board the story begins to feel thematically like a Heinlein juvenile...Like "The Rolling Stones", or "Space Cadet".  But your STYLE is all your own!

Wondering if Gene is going to get to play the romantic hero......or if the twins are going to save the day...?

Staying tuned 'til CH. 40....

On 3/24/2016 at 7:57 PM, Draconiator said:

I loved this!   But I'm out of likes again, darnit...

On 3/26/2016 at 4:34 PM, Just Jim said:

Well, I think I got all the screenshots I need for the next chapter, without a cutaway... bummer... but I'm not going to make everyone wait for another chapter until 1.1 comes out.  Tempting.... but I don't know if it will be another week from now, or another month.  

 

It's okay.....you can release a story upgrade like Lucas did for Star Wars .......just remember who shot first!

OK, I have all the screenshots for the next chapter.  I'll sort them tonight and try to get them uploaded if possible. 

But our internet provider company is switching something around, and my connection all day had been horrible. 
I'm going to try and get this next chapter done this evening, but I'm not sure if the interweb is going to cooperate or not.

One way or the other, this next chapter is going to be fun, and I promise I'll get it done as soon as I can stay logged on for more than 2 minutes at a time...

Just now, Just Jim said:

OK, I have all the screenshots for the next chapter.  I'll sort them tonight and try to get them uploaded if possible. 

I can't wait for the next chapter!

Will there be defenestration? Will there be eractic driving? Find out in the next chapter!

and remember some 42 reference in chapter 42!

2 hours ago, max_creative said:

I can't wait for the next chapter!

Will there be defenestration? Will there be eractic driving? Find out in the next chapter!

and remember some 42 reference in chapter 42!

Defenestration?  No

Erratic driving... maybe

Just now, Just Jim said:

Defenestration?  No

Erratic driving... maybe  

 

Until then... we must...

 

Stay Determined . . .

36 minutes ago, SpaceplaneAddict said:

Until then... we must...

 

Stay Determined . . .

Because in this world... IT'S KILL OR BE KILLED! HEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEH!

 

At least to Thompberry...

I do believe I'm mad, but I decided to grab all the times you've said "...is far, far from over."

I can't seem to wrap them all in a spoiler. Many, many apologies.
We know! The story is not over yet!!

I. CAN'T. WAIT. FOR. NEW. CHAPTER. SO. EXCITED!!!!!!!
